oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Cartmell Diary Vol. 3, 1863-1867
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This is volume three of a thirty-three volume set of diaries written by Robert H. Cartmell, covering the dates of May 1863-May 1867. Throughout this diary, he writes frequently of the weather and other factors that impact the management of his farm. He also writes in detail of news of the events surrounding the Civil War, and regularly reports on the information that he receives from newspapers about events within the state and throughout the country. Through it all, he continues to farm.
Robert H. Cartmell was a Madison County, Tennessee farmer.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Cartmell, Robert H., 1828-1915
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Civil War in the West; Civil War society; United States--History--1783-1865; United States--History--1849-1915; United States-- History--Civil War, 1861-1865
